review: Amazingly easy connectivity.  Seamless on-screen navigation.  I bought this to use when I travel and don't have a smart TV.  It works so much better than my smart TV at home, though, that I now use the Fire TV Stick to control my smart TV.  The Fire Stick is far easier to use than the smart TV interface.
author: Steve

review: Very pleased with my fire stick after a week. Minor buffering issues but that seems to be more of an Internet provider issue than a hardware one. Easy to use.
